channel.title: Exclusive Drops?
channel.description:
As some might be aware, I've been running a server recently and am starting to add content (finished my exams). I have recently added a "Ring of Slaying" and have made level specific zones that the ring teleports you too. I need ideas on what each npc can drop and still maintain a strong economy, and of course as each tier goes up better and harder drops.
From level 1-29 - Zone 1 - Penguin Lair. Level 30-59 - Zone 2 - Experiments. Level 60-89 - Zone 3 - Oomlie Birds Level 90-99 - Zone 4 - [b]STILL NEED SUGGESTIONS - Preferably some tough looking npc's[/b]
So if you could help me out and tell me what each zone could drop, I would be thankful!

item.title: Exclusive Drops?
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

This looks legit: http://2007.runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Terror_dog

If you can rip the model i guess… And any cavern in RS will do

Read full topic

item.title: Exclusive Drops?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

I was never able to check out your server so I can’t tell what your stores look like. Do you have stores that sell armours and weaponry? Also, what is your exp rate? It will be easier to give you loot tables if I can see how fast your players will level, as you might not need to include every tier of armour and weaponry.

Read full topic
